title: QueryElevation doesn't work with Solr LTR
description: It looks like the QueryElevation component doesn't work with using with Solr LTR.   When passing the elevateIds param and the rq param for LTR in the solr request, the elevated document is not  always in the first position.   The reranking happening in the LTRRescorer doesn't take into account the elevations.
